Proposes clear deadlines and procedural steps (letter of intent, preliminary sketches) to move project forward despite cultural and bureaucratic challenges.

Accepts returning to Jordan and tries to reassure Hani about not making further mistakes, showing confidence and diplomatic skill.

Shows awareness of timing constraints and manages scheduling effectively under pressure.

Considers and acknowledges valuable intelligence from Hani, showing openness to collaboration.
